title: Instructional Design Course for Strengthening ICT-based Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational technology skills and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Developing ICT Integration Competencies Linked to Language Education Curricula in BYOD Environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the ICT tool-based lesson design process step-by-step in language instruction
Learners develop and implement at least three types of learner-engaged language activities using digital resources
Learners can create and self-assess a teacher ICT competency checklist based on international standards (ICT-CFT)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
